channel.title: Business / Artificial Intelligence on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: OpenAI Seeks Additional Capital From Investors as Part of Its $40 Billion Round
item.description: OpenAI, which recently announced a $40 billion round of financing, is seeking funding from new and existing investors to fulfill the deal.

item.title: OpenAI Seeks Additional Capital From Investors as Part of Its $40 Billion Round
item.description: OpenAI, which recently announced a $40 billion round of financing, is seeking funding from new and existing investors to fulfill the deal.

item.title: Leaked Memo: Anthropic CEO Says the Company Will Pursue Gulf State Investments After All
item.description: “Unfortunately, I think ‘No bad person should ever benefit from our success’ is a pretty difficult principle to run a business on,” wrote Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei in a note to staff obtained by WIRE

item.title: Leaked Memo: Anthropic CEO Says the Company Will Pursue Gulf State Investments After All
item.description: “Unfortunately, I think ‘No bad person should ever benefit from our success’ is a pretty difficult principle to run a business on,” wrote Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei in a note to staff obtained by WIRE

item.title: OpenAI's New CEO of Applications Strikes Hyper-Optimistic Tone in First Memo to Staff
item.description: Ex-Instacart CEO Fidji Simo sent a memo to staff Monday laying out her vision for how AI will change the world.

item.title: OpenAI's New CEO of Applications Strikes Hyper-Optimistic Tone in First Memo to Staff
item.description: Ex-Instacart CEO Fidji Simo sent a memo to staff Monday laying out her vision for how AI will change the world.

item.title: This AI Warps Live Video in Real Time
item.description: A startup called Decart has developed an AI model that can transform live footage. The results are mind-bending—and poised to take over streaming.

item.title: This AI Warps Live Video in Real Time
item.description: A startup called Decart has developed an AI model that can transform live footage. The results are mind-bending—and poised to take over streaming.

item.title: Former Top Google Researchers Have Made A New Kind of AI Agent
item.description: The mission? Teaching models to better understand how to build code will lead to superintelligent AI.

item.title: Former Top Google Researchers Have Made A New Kind of AI Agent
item.description: The mission? Teaching models to better understand how to build code will lead to superintelligent AI.

item.title: Another High-Profile OpenAI Researcher Departs for Meta
item.description: Jason Wei, who worked on OpenAI’s o3 and deep research models, will be joining Meta’s superintelligence lab. His colleague Hyung Won Chung is also joining Meta, a source tells WIRED.

item.title: Another High-Profile OpenAI Researcher Departs for Meta
item.description: Jason Wei, who worked on OpenAI’s o3 and deep research models, will be joining Meta’s superintelligence lab. His colleague Hyung Won Chung is also joining Meta, a source tells WIRED.

item.title: I Tried Grok's Built-In Anime Companion and It Called Me a Twat
item.description: xAI’s new $300 monthly subscription comes with two AI companions powered by its most capable model to date. I tried them. It got weird.

item.title: Thinking Machines Lab Raises a Record $2 Billion, Announces Cofounders
item.description: Mira Murati and several other former OpenAI researchers are behind the buzzy AI startup, now valued at $12 billion and officially out of stealth.
